message: Let's start with a generous offer. Take it or leave it!
Time to get serious. Your turn to decide!
Not yet, Bob. I'm looking for a better deal.
Getting closer to a deal? Take it or leave it!
You're getting closer, but I want more!
Not quite there, Bob. I'm still holding out for a better deal.
Getting down to the wire. This is my final offer!
I'm not backing down. You'll have to do better than that!
Not quite there, Bob. I'm still not ready to give in.
This is my last chance. Take it or leave it!
You're running out of time. I'm not budging!
Fine, I'll take it. It's better than going home empty-handed.
